criteria.details: Score: 0.00 - The analyst did not identify that OCF (row 64 in BS & CFS) is missing the adjustment for finance costs, net. This specific and critical cash flow linkage error was completely missed.
Score: 0.00 - The analyst failed to identify the rogue -10 value in cell K32 of the FS Calcs sheet. There is no mention of FS Calcs or any isolated hard-coded value error.
Score: 0.00 - The analyst did not identify that row 70 in BS & CFS is missing the addition of PPE including leases (row 66). This structural balance sheet roll-forward error was not addressed.
